mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.baoyangdengji_uuid_number as baoyangdengjiUuidNumber ,a.baoyangdengji_name as baoyangdengjiName ,a.baoyangdengji_types as baoyangdengjiTypes ,a.baoyangdengji_content as baoyangdengjiContent ,a.baoyangdengji_time as baoyangdengjiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.zhunjia_types as zhunjiaTypes ,yonghu.jiashizhenghao as jiashizhenghao ,yonghu.yonghu_content as yonghuContent ,yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number as yuangongUuidNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail
FROM baoyangdengji a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.baoyangdengji_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.baoyangdengjiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.baoyangdengji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.baoyangdengjiName},'%')
and a.baoyangdengji_types = #{params.baoyangdengjiTypes}
and a.baoyangdengji_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.baoyangdengjiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.baoyangdengji_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.baoyangdengjiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.baoyangdengji_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.baoyangdengjiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.zhunjia_types = #{params.zhunjiaTypes}
and yonghu.jiashizhenghao like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiashizhenghao},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongUuidNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
